INSTALLATION
========================================

Option 1 - Quick Test:
  Just double-click: dist/SSR JSON Editor.app

Option 2 - Install to Applications:
  1. Open Finder
  2. Navigate to: dist/
  3. Drag "SSR JSON Editor.app" to /Applications

========================================
FIRST LAUNCH
========================================

On first launch, macOS may block the app because it's not signed
with an Apple Developer certificate.

To allow it:
  1. Right-click "SSR JSON Editor.app"
  2. Select "Open"
  3. Click "Open" in the security dialog

Or:
  Run this command: xattr -cr "dist/SSR JSON Editor.app"

WINDOWS BUILD

To build for Windows:

  3. Run: build_windows.bat
  4. Output: dist\SSR JSON Editor.exe
